      public String getLinearTransactionCost(double initialAmount, double a)
      Calculates the linear transaction cost
      Parameters:
      initialAmount - Initially traded amount.
      a - A coefficient (e.g. 0.005 for 0.5% per trade).
      Returns:
      The linear transaction cost.
